text: 'aw yakun lak bayt min dhhb, 'aw tusaeid fi daraj 'iilaa alsma', walan nsddiqk fi sewdk hataa tewd, wmek kitab min allah manshur naqra fih 'anak rasul allah haqaaan. qul -ayha alrswl- mtejbana min tennut hwla' alkfar: subhan rby!! hal 'ana 'iilaa eabd min eibadih mblligh rsalth? fkyf aqdr ealaa fiel ma ttlbwn?
